Product information: Anthroposophical letters, Grimms Material: lime decoration article! not suitable for playing! Grimms wooden toys like birthday ring, letters in rainbow colours, Waldorf building blocks you will find [here](https://www.waldorfshop.eu/hersteller/grimms)... Grimms wooden toys Grimms Spiel und Holz Design manufactures the wooden toys on the Swabian Alb and stands for especially high-quality wooden toys. In the assortment of Grimms you will find many wooden toys that are real toy classics, just think of the wonderfully bright, harmoniously shaped rainbow. In the philosophy of Grimms Spiel und Holz Design, wooden toys are not only there to simply keep a child busy. It is above all important that children receive toys that are appropriate to their age and development. Above all, they should be there to stimulate children's imagination, which is the creative potential that can be available to a person throughout life. Through beautiful, artistically designed wooden toys made of natural materials, such as wood, and of good quality, the sense of beauty and of what quality actually means is also encouraged. Grimms considers this to be an important task in our "throwaway society." Attention! Decorative article! Not suitable for playing!
